main event: Visual observation of a meteorite incident near Oklahoma City, Oklahoma on November 9, 1964.
interesting points: The meteor reportedly struck a city boy's car, creating a shower of sparks., The boy found fragments of the meteorite after the incident., Analysis revealed the fragments to be a nickel-iron meteorite, which is extremely rare., The incident was investigated by both local authorities and Project Blue Book., Witnesses reported seeing bright glowing objects in the sky around the time of the meteorite impact.
witness description: City boy and two other local boys who observed the meteorite fall and its aftermath.
